ingredients: 4 cups cooked, cooled brown rice (cooked from 1 cup dry rice according to package)
3 Tbs your favorite cooking oil, divided (I used olive)
½ - 1 poblano, seeded and chopped (use a whole pepper if you like a little heat)
½ - 1 jalapeno, seeded and chopped (optional and for serious heat lovers only)
1½ c fresh or frozen corn kernels
2 Roma tomatoes, extra juice squeezed out and chopped
3 c cooked black beans (or 2 cans, rinsed and drained)
1 c fresh cilantro leaves and stems, chopped
extra cilantro and lime to serve
extra cilantro and lime to serve
